name: iris
description: Modern AI-powered research and automation platform with advanced web capabilities

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && bun run dev" "cd backend && bun run dev"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently "cd frontend && bun run dev" "cd backend && bun run dev" "bun run watch:build"
scripts.watch:build: chokidar "frontend/src/**/*" -c "bun --cwd frontend run build && cp -r frontend/.next backend/public"
scripts.build: bun --cwd frontend run build && cp -r frontend/.next backend/public/ && bun --cwd backend run build
